channel.title: On a deltabase server, how can i move items into the right slot?
channel.description: on a deltabase server, how can i move items like statius helmet into the helmet spot. i remember it has something to do with item, or item4?? also for platebodys it's.. body and plate?? some one explain it please thank you all vm :]

item.title: On a deltabase server, how can i move items into the right slot?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Item class, put it in any static int that deals with helmets.

Read full topic
